content:
Back in the days of Skype we used to have
a "chat" for FHIR Poetry --- some dark
and lost to sands of time (I fear; at least
they're not Wayback-able these days.

This parenthetical diversion called to mind
that other logs are published from the time
of Skype, like this old implementers chat,
pre-Zulip topics blending chaos,
interleaved
discussion dating pre-DSTU.
The earliest eternally preserved:

2014-06-02 00:12:01Z Richard Schneider: In http://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/fhir/extras.html#compartment the example has a lower-case compartment name (e.g. /condition). However, http://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/fhir/compartment-patient.html lists the compartments as Capitalised.

But time for close parenthesis.)

In any case, the iambs dancing from
my fingertips compel me create
another incarnation, Zulip-style.
from a very different time at HL7: http://www.healthintersections.com.au/?p=267
(that was from the skype poetry channel)
